properties.name: hygge.web-toolkit.controller.log.auto-register
properties.description: Controller 层是否为 REST 请求开启基于 AOP 实现的出入参日志功能.

properties.name: hygge.web-toolkit.controller.log.aspect-order
properties.description: Controller 层请求日志 AOP 切面优先级.

properties.name: hygge.web-toolkit.validator.hygge-code.base-packages
properties.description: 自定义 HyggeCode 所在的包路径，多个时用 "," 分隔.

properties.name: hygge.util.http-helper.default.auto-register
properties.description: 是否自动在 Spring 上下文中注册默认的 HttpHelper 实例.

properties.name: hygge.util.http-helper.default.ignore-s-s-l
properties.description: 自动在 Spring 上下文中注册的默认 HttpHelper 实例是否忽略 https 证书校验.

properties.name: hygge.util.http-helper.default.log-type
properties.description: 自动在 Spring 上下文中注册的默认 HttpHelper 实例的网络请求自动日志类型.

properties.name: hygge.util.http-helper.default.connection.connect-time-out
properties.description: 自动在 Spring 上下文中注册的默认 HttpHelper 实例的网络请求连接超时时间.

properties.name: hygge.util.http-helper.default.connection.read-time-out
properties.description: 自动在 Spring 上下文中注册的默认 HttpHelper 实例的网络请求读取超时时间.

properties.name: hygge.util.http-helper.default.connection.max-total
properties.description: 自动在 Spring 上下文中注册的默认 HttpHelper 实例进行网络请求的全域合计最大并发数.

properties.name: hygge.util.http-helper.default.connection.max-per-route
properties.description: 自动在 Spring 上下文中注册的默认 HttpHelper 实例进行网络请求的单独域下最大并发.
